songs.title: Mr. Bobby
songs.lyrics:
[Hook 2X]
Everything that I say, hey, is gonna be alright (alright)

[Hook]
Hey Mr. Bobby (hey Mr. Bobby)
Sing something good to me (so good so good so good oh)
And this world's so crazy (this world is crazy) so it's an emergency
Hey Mr. Bobby (hey Mr. Bobby)
Sing something good to me (so good so good so good oh)
And this world's so crazy (this world is crazy) so it's an emergency

[Verse 1: B.o.B]
Somebody tell me what's wrong (wrong)
I get in my car and my radio is gone (so?)
But even when I had it they ain't never play my song (song)
Instead, what they playing got me bored and withdrawn (withdrawn)
Well I am not a hipster, I am not a clone (nah)
Don't ask what I got on, cause I wear what I want (want)
And yes sometimes I swear, someone's listening to my phone (phone)
I'm living in a world that ain't fair, but so long (goodbye)
Now people say

[Hook 2X]

[Hook]

[Verse 2: B.o.B]
Yes I can hear them sing (sing) Bobby
Screaming out, yeah but they souls saying "save me" (save me)
Hands high, this is an invasion ('vasion)
It's obvious, something came upon us and enslaved us (enslaved us)
Why we trying to make it on these bare minimum wages? (yeah)
Overdraft fees on my Wachovia statement (yeah)
I'm still living in a basement (yeah)
Trying to make music for the folks who endangered, sang it

[Hook 2X]

[Hook]

[Outro]
Hey, hey hey!
Now everybody say alright (alright)
Geah geah geah geah
Now everybody say alright (alright)
Now say alright (alright)
Now say alright (alright)
Now say alright (alright)
Say alright (alright)

[Hook]
